title: Talc-Free Baby Care: Ayurveda’s Gentle Touch
author: Harish
excerpt: Learn why talc-free baby powders matter and how rice starch and chamomile keep delicate skin dry and soothed.
content:
Why Go Talc-Free?

Parents today prefer talc-free formulas due to concerns about inhalation and sensitivity. Plant-based powders offer a safer way to absorb moisture without dryness or irritation.

Ayurvedic Ingredients That Help

  • Rice starch: Lightweight, absorbs moisture gently.
  • Chamomile: Calming herb ideal for infant Vata balance.
  • Neem: Supports microbial balance when used sparingly.

How to Use Baby Powder Safely

  1. Always apply to your hands first, then to baby—never puff directly.
  2. Use only on fully dry skin.
  3. Avoid diaper folds if irritation persists; consult a pediatrician.
